verses.text: KO ia na‘e omi ‘a e tu‘i mo Hāmani ke kātoanga mo ‘Ēseta ko e kuini.

Pea folofola ‘a e tu‘i kia ‘Ēseta ‘i hono ‘aho ua foki, ‘i he‘enau inu uaine, Ko e hā ho‘o kole, Kuini ‘Ēseta? pea ‘e ‘atu: ‘io, ko e hā ‘a e me‘a ‘oku ke fiema‘u? pea ‘e fai, neongo ko e vaeua ‘o e pule‘anga.

Pea tali ‘e Kuini ‘Ēseta, ‘o ne fakatau folofola, ‘Ēī, ka kuo u ta‘imālie ‘ofa ‘i he ‘afiona, pea ka ‘oku lelei ki he ‘afiona, pea tuku mai ke u mo‘ui–ko ‘eku kole ia–mo hoku kakai foki–ko e me‘a ia ‘oku ou fiema‘u.

He kuo fakatau kimautolu, ‘a au mo hoku kakai, ke faka‘auha, ke tāmate‘i, pea ke faka‘osi. Ka ‘oka ne ko e fakatau kimautolu ke tamaio‘eiki mo kaunanga, pehē kuo u fakalongo, neongo ‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e he fili ke fakaai ‘a e fakamasiva ‘o e tu‘i.
Pea folofola ‘a Kingi ‘Ehasivelo kia ‘Ēseta ko e kuini, Ko hai tū ia, pea ‘oku ne ‘i fē, kuo ‘afungi hono loto ke fai ha me‘a pehē?
Pea tali ‘e ‘Ēseta. Ha tangata fakamamahi mo fili–‘a Hāmani Kovi na! Pea manavahē ‘a Hāmani ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e tu‘i mo e kuini.

Pea me‘a hake ‘a e tu‘i mei he inu uaine kuo tuputāmaki, ‘o ne ‘alu ki he ngouetapu ‘o e palasi: pea tu‘u ‘a Hāmani ke kole mo‘ui meia Kuini ‘Ēseta; he na‘a ne vakai kuo pau ‘a e mala kiate ia mei he tu‘i.

Pea foki ‘a e tu‘i mei he ngouetapu ‘o e palasi ki he fale taumafa uaine, pea ko Hāmani e kuo hinga ki he sofa ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a ‘Ēseta. Pea folofola ‘a e tu‘i, Te ne tohotoho‘i foki ‘a e kuini, ‘i fale, ‘i hoku ‘ao! Ko e tō mai leva ‘a e lea mei he fofonga ‘o e tu‘i na‘a nau ‘ai ‘a e pūlou ki he fofonga ‘o Hāmani.

Pea fakatau folofola hake ‘a Ha‘apona ko e taha ‘i he kau ‘iunoke na‘e fai ‘a e fakafe‘ao ki he tu‘i, Vakai foki, ko e ‘akau na‘e ngaohi ‘e Hāmani kia Motekiai na‘e tala me‘a ‘aonga ma‘a e tu‘i, ‘oku kei tu‘u ia ‘i he fale ‘o Hāmani, ‘oku nimangofulu‘i kiupite hono mā‘olunga.
Pea folofola ‘a e tu‘i, Fakatūfana‘i ia ‘i ai. Ko ia na‘a nau fakatūfana‘i ‘a Hāmani ‘i he ‘akau na‘a ne teu mo‘o Motekiai. Pea na‘e toki lolou ai ‘a e houhau ‘o e tu‘i.
